title: FA Metadata - History Section
description: Historical information about previous measurements or analysis steps in the workflow.

history.description: Contains links and references to previous analysis steps.

previousMeasurements.description: Array of references to previous measurements.

headerFilePath.description: Path to previous metadata JSON file.

workflowStep.description: Current step number in the analysis workflow.

workflowDescription.description: Description of the current workflow step.
